column3: Improved the comment in `CKey::SignSchnorr` to elaborate on the 3 variants of tweaking (pointed out [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21365#discussion_r653907350)).

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
